(deliverystatus) Status of your campaign
Result of your campaign
The total number of times your ad was served to a user. Tracked when the ad fully renders on a device for the first time during a user’s viewing session.
(viewable_impressions) An ad that meets the criteria of being visible in the browser window for a continous 1 second.
(video views) Total number of views we got on our video
(video watched 2second) The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 2 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap
(video watched 6second)The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 6 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap

(avg_screen_time) The average number of seconds spent watching your ad across all paid impressions. Screen time starts recording as soon as the media is fully rendered on the device and the autoplay video starts.
Spend based on delivery
The total number of taps on your Public Profile from your ads
(total page view) The total number of times a user has viewed an ad in your app or website.
(story open ) Number of times a Snapchatter taps on the Story Ad in the Discover Feed.
Effective cost per thousand impressions.
Effective cost per order.
Clickthrough rate (clicks ÷ impressions = CTR)
Cost Per Click
Cost it will take to reach a certain desired goal and/or objective.
(story_open_rate)The rate at which Snapchatters tap on the tile. (Story Opens / Story Impressions) * 100.
(cost per story open)The average cost of each Story Open.
The total number of orders you recieved in CRM.
(crm confirmed) The total number of orders confirmed by CRM.
(avg sales per confirm) The Average number of sales per confirmed CRM's.
total register sales
avg seles order
(crm cancelled) The total number of orders cancelled by CRM.
(crm sendback) The total number of sendback by CRM.
(total picked up)The total number of orders picked by delivery team.
(picked up) Order picked by delivery team
(logis delivered)The total number of orders delivered by logistics team.
(logis cancelled) The total number of orders cancelled by logistics team.
(sale price)the Total Sale Price
(exact price) the Total Exact Price
The total sale
The cost of product
The cost of delivery
(crm confirmed percentage) = CRM Confirmed % ((CRM Confirmed * 100 ) ÷ Total Order)
(crm cancelled percentage) = CRM Cancelled % ((CRM Cancelled * 100) ÷ Total Order
CRM sendback in percentage
Difference of CRM
(crm delivered percentage)  Total number of orders delivered by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(crm_cancelled_percentage) = Total number of orders cancelled by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(final percentage) = (Total number of orders delivered orders ÷ total orders) * 100
(total expense) Ad cost + delivery cost
Total profit and loss
(Profit percentage) = (Total sales - total expense) ÷ Total sales
Product cost in percentage
Delivery cost in percentage
Ad cost in percentage
CRM in percentage
Logistics in percentage
(Total users) The total number of users  we got in lifetime
(new users) The total number of new user we got
(user engagement) The total number of user engaging with our platform
Group of user interactions with your website that take place within a given time frame
(engaged sessions) The number of sessions that lasted 10 seconds or longer, or had 1 or more conversion events or 2 or more page or screen views.
(page view) The total number of page views divided by the total number of visits during the same timeframe
(engagement rate) The number of interactions divided by actual reach and multiplied by 100.
(server created at)The date when server was created
(server updated at)The date when server was updated
(data date)For which date the data belongs to
The date/time when data was created
The date/time when data was updated
